sentence.Network_en: Visitor arrivals dro ed by one - third between mid - March and mid - April.

sentence.Network_en: The kits will be available from mid - March 2006, the Underwater Pro Kit from mid - April.

sentence.Network_en: In April 1944 he was killed on active service.
